title: League themed twitter banners I recently made.
body:
Hello.

I recently made these league themed twitter banners for a few friends along with some I made for fun. Looking for opinions and such :3

http://i.imgur.com/x7wLR8W.png

http://i.imgur.com/lHCZBlR.png

http://i.imgur.com/1IGnKEm.png

http://i.imgur.com/p4Nsabk.png

Let me know what you all think and thanks for having a look!

-Elam

replies.body:
Oooo really dig these!

Only feedback I would have is for PABU's one.

Fiora's arm is covering the bend in the U so at a glance I'm not sure whether it says PABU or PABII.

You could probably push fiora out to the right a bit more. Make sure that a little bit of the U bend is visible and you'll be sweet!

I'd also not wrap her arm around the letter because it's kind of breaking the flow of the image - she's charging towards the left and engaging her in the same space/world as the letter physically means I'm now trying to relate those 2 things in my brain (and all of a sudden it doesn't make sense!). I suggest just having her on a layer above the letters instead.

Hey mate just curious. I really appreciate you feedback here and its really helpful. Was wondering if I could add you in client and we could have a chat from time to time. Hoping we can learn a few things off of each other graphic design wise xD

Thanks for the feedback, I was thinking about that when I was making that, I actually duplicated the layer of the text and put it at like 5% opacity so you can hopefully read it. I wanted to move fiora to the right like you suggested but sadly the splash art isn't long enough as you can see in the WIP image I have here: http://puu.sh/mhOEG/9d218fe4f3.jpg (also explains how I extended the splash all the way to fit xD )
Nice work, they look great :3 I personally like how the "U" goes around her arm.

could u make me one that shits dope bruh or how u done it

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
Add me in client man and we can have a chat
